title: Tips on  Riven vs. Teemo matchup
body: So recently I have been playing alot riven in my games. I bumped into a problem one game, this was when I was vsing a Teemo at top. I got rekt and really annoyed because he kept on zoning me away from the creeps, so that I couldn't get them. It was very frustrating and Before I knew it, he one shot me when i tried to go for a quick combo. Can anyone give me a few tips on how to win this matchup?

replies.body:
Get your shield first, you Q second. You want to shield yourself to go in and last-hit, then go back to safety using 1,2 maybe 3 Qs. Rinse and repeat.

At lvl 6 press R and smash your keyboard and win.Even easier if the jungler ganks. Rush a hexdrinker to survive.

As a note; pay attention to the distance between you and the Teemo. If he presses W and goes in he might deal serious damage.
Ty for the response your tips really helped me vs those cancer ass teemo mains.
